ul.li: The battery provides backup power for the hardware configuration and RAID disk writeable cache while the appliance is powered off and unplugged from an AC power source. Batteries are valid for a specified duration. This command displays the start and end of that duration.

refbody.section: ExampleDisplay expected battery expiration.Console> status battery Battery installed: Feb 17, 2012 7:25:45 PM Battery expires: Feb 16, 2014 7:25:45 PM Console>
Information for consumers onlyThere is no facility to actually determine battery lifetime, so an estimate is made that the battery will need replacing two years after appliance manufacturing date.
